name: RadiAngel
description:
Waking up from stasis alone with no memories years ago Em has made peace with living a calm quiet life in her bunker, until one day while watching the cameras she spots a woman who needs help. Letting her into her life and bunker Em changes both of their lives forever...

Game made for the VN Cup, I hope you enjoy!

The game is free but if you'd like to support my future projects I have a Patreon <3
